mapper.sql: f_protect_id, f_agent_corp_id, f_agent_user_id, f_status, f_start_time, f_end_time, f_province, f_city, f_sales_id, f_company_name, f_company_alias, f_website, f_industry, f_intent, f_contact_name, f_contact_phone, f_contact_more, f_title, f_create_time, f_is_renew, f_cancel_time, f_cancel_user_id, f_cancel_corp_id, f_mark_animus
mapper.select:
select
from `d_ec_agent`.`t_agent_protect` where f_company_name = #{corpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by f_protect_id desc LIMIT 1
select count(*) from `d_ec_agent`.`t_agent_protect` where f_agent_corp_id =#{corpId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND f_status = 1 AND f_end_time >= now()

mapper.update:
update `d_ec_agent`.`t_agent_protect`
f_agent_corp_id = #{agentCorpId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
f_agent_user_id = #{agentUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
f_status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
f_start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
f_end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

f_city = #{city,jdbcType=INTEGER},
f_sales_id = #{salesId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where f_protect_id = #{protectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update `d_ec_agent`.`t_agent_protect` set f_agent_corp_id = #{agentCorpId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_agent_user_id = #{agentUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, f_start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, f_end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, f_province = #{province,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_city = #{city,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_sales_id = #{salesId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_company_alias = #{companyAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_website = #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_industry = #{industry,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_intent = #{intent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_contact_name = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_contact_phone = #{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_contact_more = #{contactMore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, f_is_renew = #{isRenew,jdbcType=TINYINT}, f_cancel_time = #{cancelTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, f_cancel_user_id = #{cancelUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_cancel_corp_id = #{cancelCorpId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_mark_animus = #{markAnimus,jdbcType=TINYINT} where f_protect_id = #{protectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT a.f_province, a.f_city FROM d_ec_agent.t_agent_area a JOIN d_ec_agent.t_agent_config c ON (a.f_id = c.f_agent_corp_id) WHERE a.f_province != 0 AND a.f_type=0 AND a.f_id=#{corpId}
SELECT f_protect_num FROM d_ec_agent.t_agent_config WHERE f_agent_corp_id=#{corpId};

select
from `d_ec_agent`.`t_agent_protect` where f_company_name =#{corpName} and f_status = 1 and f_end_time >= now()
